sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_gear"> <x_176383_star_wars_gear action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <base_damage>0</base_damage> <critical_rating/> <defense/> <description>Another product from the ubiquitous Tagge Company and other corporations, implant armor is useful for occasions where obvious armor protection might be impractical or even act as an insult to prospective business partners. These thin plates rest under the skin, where they can absorb enemy fire with little serious damage to vulnerable tissue.  Implant armor provides + 1 soak.   Models Include: TaggeCo Implant Armor Mod V, BioTech "Duraskin" Implant.</description> <encumbrance>0</encumbrance> <hard_points/> <hp_required/> <name>Implant Armor</name> <number>GEAR0001070</number> <price>7500</price> <range/> <rarity>6</rarity> <skill_used/> <soak>1</soak> <sys_class_name/> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-11-02 19:30:17</sys_created_on> <sys_id>1fd3e7282f14a450e0f497eef699b6bb</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-12-28 18:02:03</sys_updated_on> <type>gear</type> </x_176383_star_wars_gear> </record_update>
